items.title: WebGL w/ Unity: The Ultimate Guide to Games in the Browser
items.headline: Unity3D is the easiest way to deploy HTML5 games! (Easier than three.js, babylon.js, phaser and playcanvas!)

items.title: Rigging Your Character For 3D Animation In Unreal Engine 4!
items.headline: 'Allright Rig 1.3' Rigging & Animation Plugin Included.  Rigged (The Dweller) Character Included. Complete UE4 Project.

You will receive the Creature "The Dweller" by Josh P. Crockett - fully rigged and ready to animate!
Course includes the full Unreal Engine 4.17 scene - setup and ready to go! (v 4.17 required for the free version of Allright Rig 1.3)
